Vaporwave Cassette Player

2020

Pitch

Walkman + iPod = Vaporwave Cassette Player

The Idea

Remixing old school with new tech, a cassette player that is controlled by a touch screen for playback and volume

Domain Names

  • vaporwavecassetteplayer.com

Alternate Names

  • Vaporman
  • Waveman

Features/Content

  • Cassette player
  • Playblack and volume controls
  • Manual eject open and close button
  • Pairs with bluetooth speakers
